prompt: create a list of 50 "message of the day" quotes

message.author: Theodore Roosevelt
message.message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

message.author: Steve Jobs
message.message: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

message.author: William James
message.message: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

message.author: Roy T. Bennett
message.message: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

message.author: Zig Ziglar
message.message: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

message.author: C.S. Lewis
message.message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

message.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
message.message: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

message.author: Wayne Gretzky
message.message: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

message.author: George Eliot
message.message: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

message.author: Sam Levenson
message.message: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

message.author: Peter Drucker
message.message: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

message.author: Steve Jobs
message.message: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

message.author: Walt Disney
message.message: If you can dream it, you can do it.

message.author: Dalai Lama
message.message: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

message.author: Theodore Roosevelt
message.message: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

message.author: Henry Ford
message.message: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.

message.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
message.message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

message.author: Henry David Thoreau
message.message: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

message.author: Unknown
message.message: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.

message.author: Norman Vaughan
message.message: Dream big and dare to fail.

message.author: Vince Lombardi
message.message: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.

message.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
message.message: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

message.author: Roy T. Bennett
message.message: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

message.author: Walt Whitman
message.message: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.

message.author: Brian Tracy
message.message: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.

message.author: Chris Grosser
message.message: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.

message.author: Robert Collier
message.message: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.

message.author: Muhammad Ali
message.message: Don’t count the days, make the days count.

message.author: A.A. Milne
message.message: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.

message.author: Walt Disney
message.message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

message.author: Jordan Belfort
message.message: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can’t achieve it.

message.author: Theodore Roosevelt
message.message: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.

message.author: Maya Angelou
message.message: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.

message.author: Booker T. Washington
message.message: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.

message.author: Tony Robbins
message.message: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

message.author: Bo Bennett
message.message: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

message.author: Robert H. Schuller
message.message: Today’s accomplishments were yesterday’s impossibilities.

message.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
message.message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

message.author: Zig Ziglar
message.message: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

message.author: Bruce Lee
message.message: A goal is not always meant to be reached; it often serves simply as something to aim at.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: Great things never come from comfort zones.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: Dream bigger. Do bigger.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: Little things make big days.

message.author: Anonymous
message.message: It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.

prompt: by characters from game of thrones or from house of the dragon

message.author: Ned Stark
message.message: When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies but the pack survives.

message.author: Tyrion Lannister
message.message: A mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone.

message.author: Petyr Baelish
message.message: Chaos isn’t a pit. Chaos is a ladder.

message.author: Jaime Lannister
message.message: The things I do for love.

message.author: Bran Stark
message.message: The greatest war is not against your enemies, but within yourself.

message.author: House Targaryen
message.message: Fire and Blood.

message.message: A lion does not concern himself with the opinion of sheep.

message.author: Ned Stark
message.message: Winter is Coming.

message.message: The past is a ghost. The future is a dream. All we ever have is now.

message.author: Tyrion Lannister
message.message: I drink and I know things.

message.author: Robb Stark
message.message: Every man must die, but not every man truly lives.

message.author: The Ironborn
message.message: What is dead may never die.

message.author: Petyr Baelish
message.message: Knowledge is power.

message.author: Daenerys Targaryen
message.message: To be a dragon, you must have fire in your blood.

message.author: Sansa Stark
message.message: We are all human. We all bleed.

message.author: Arya Stark
message.message: Fear cuts deeper than swords.

message.author: Melisandre
message.message: The night is dark and full of terrors.

message.author: Syrio Forel
message.message: Your bliss is in your truth. Find it.

message.author: Ygritte
message.message: You know nothing, Jon Snow.

message.author: Varys
message.message: Power resides where men believe it resides.

message.author: Olenna Tyrell
message.message: You serve the realm, you serve the king, you serve your family.

message.author: Daemon Targaryen
message.message: Dragons are not a lazy creature.

message.author: Jon Snow
message.message: Love is the death of duty.

message.author: Barristan Selmy
message.message: Everybody dies sooner or later. Make your death mean something.

message.author: Cersei Lannister
message.message: There is no justice in the world. Only power.

message.author: Euron Greyjoy
message.message: Sometimes, the best way to get to the heart of a man is to take a knife to it.

message.author: Rhaenyra Targaryen
message.message: You cannot stop the change any more than you can stop the suns from setting.

message.author: Arya Stark
message.message: A girl has no name.

message.author: Daenerys Targaryen
message.message: The only way to win is to do it together.

message.author: Tyrion Lannister
message.message: Live by the sword, die by the sword.

message.author: Varys
message.message: The truth is rarely pure and never simple.

message.author: Littlefinger
message.message: A man with no motive is a man with no end.

message.author: Viserys Targaryen
message.message: The past is a lesson. The future a battle.

message.author: Davos Seaworth
message.message: Faith is not supposed to be a comfort. It’s supposed to be a challenge.

message.author: Brienne of Tarth
message.message: Beneath the armor, there is a man. Respect the man.

message.author: Rhaegar Targaryen
message.message: Only the mad survive.

message.author: Tyrion Lannister
message.message: Minds are like swords; the more they are sharpened, the greater the power.

message.author: Hodor
message.message: Hold the door!

message.author: Robb Stark
message.message: A good king knows when to listen.

message.author: Julius Caesar (quoted by Tyrion Lannister)
message.message: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.

message.author: House Targaryen
message.message: Dare to be different. Embrace your inner dragon.

message.author: House Greyjoy
message.message: We do not sow.

message.author: Petyr Baelish
message.message: A fight is not won by the strongest. It is won by the smartest.

message.author: Olenna Tyrell

message.author: Cersei Lannister
message.message: Love is poison. A sweet poison, yes, but it will kill you all the same.

message.author: Jaime Lannister

prompt: related to American Politics from the past month

message.author: Barbara Jordan
message.message: Democracy is not a spectator sport.

message.author: Abraham Lincoln
message.message: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

message.author: Theodore Roosevelt
message.message: Nothing worth having comes easy.

message.author: Unknown
message.message: Vote as if your life depends on it, because it does.

message.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
message.message: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.

message.author: John F. Kennedy
message.message: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.

message.author: Unknown
message.message: A government that is afraid to look after its own people is a government that is doomed to fail.

message.author: Unknown
message.message: Politics is not about the people you elect; it's about the people who vote.

message.author: Audre Lorde
message.message: Your silence will not protect you.

message.author: Amelia Earhart
message.message: The most effective way to do it is to do it.

message.author: Thomas Jefferson
message.message: When the people fear the government, there is tyranny. When the government fears the people, there is liberty.

message.author: Unknown
message.message: We are stronger together than we could ever be alone.

message.author: Nelson Mandela
message.message: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.

message.author: Unknown
message.message: Access to the ballot is a fundamental right.

message.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
message.message: Freedom is never voluntarily given by the oppressor; it must be demanded by the oppressed.

message.author: Groucho Marx
message.message: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly, and applying the wrong remedies.

message.author: Thomas Jefferson
message.message: An informed citizenry is at the heart of a dynamic democracy.

message.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
message.message: The ultimate measure of a man is what he does with his power.

message.author: George W. Bush
message.message: You have to take the initiative and play your game. In a decisive moment, you have to be bold.

message.author: Abraham Lincoln
message.message: Elections belong to the people. It's their decision.

message.author: Sojourner Truth
message.message: Truth is powerful and it prevails.

message.author: Unknown
message.message: Together, we can build a better future.

message.author: Sheryl Sandberg
message.message: Leadership is about making others better as a result of your presence.

message.author: Plato
message.message: The price of apathy towards public affairs is to be ruled by evil men.

message.author: Unknown
message.message: Each of us is called to become a voice for the voiceless.

message.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
message.message: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.

message.author: Mahatma Gandhi
message.message: The future depends on what you do today.

message.author: Mahatma Gandhi
message.message: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

message.author: Harold Laswell
message.message: Politics is the science of who gets what, when, and how.

message.author: Cesar Chavez
message.message: We cannot seek achievement for ourselves and forget about progress and prosperity for our community.

message.author: Abraham Lincoln
message.message: Democracy is the government of the people, by the people, for the people.

message.author: William James
message.message: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

message.message: To deny people their human rights is to challenge their very humanity.

message.message: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.

message.author: Edmund Burke
message.message: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.

message.message: Democracy is not a one-time event, but a way of life.

message.message: Your vote is your voice; make sure it is heard.

message.message: Politics is about the lives we touch.

message.message: United we stand, divided we fall.

message.message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
